content: skip 1 1 double_crochet in the next st continue chain 1 skip 1 1 double_crochet until the corner in the corner 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the last corner in the last corner space 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st to close the round repeat rounds 1-6 until the desired size is achieved image c2 opyright notice copyright © 2025 by juan the yarn addict jtya designs llc all rights reserved this pattern is for video tutorial available on youtube personal use only it may not be reproduced distributed @juantheyarnaddict or sold without the express written permission of the designer finished items made from this pattern may be sold but please credit the designer please like/share/subscribe social media juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juan the yarn addict and friends
